pkgmetadata.longdescription: Furniture for Quantitative Scientists // Contains two main functions (i.e., two pieces of furniture): table1() which produces a well-formatted table of descriptives common as Table 1 in research articles and washer() which is helpful in cleaning up the data. In addition, long() and wide(), built on the stats::reshape(), can help reformat the data. These furniture functions are designed to simplify common tasks in quantitative analysis. Other data summary and cleaning tools are also available.
